page.title: 18ARABLE FARMING
page.content: Although the area has a good deal of high ground the valley is used for intensive arable farming. A crop of some importance is Barley.This is either sown in Autumn or Spring.Wheat and Oats are also grown but are less common due to the climate of the area.A crop which is beginning to appear is Oilseed rape.Some farms grow small areas of potatoes but these are mostly for their own use.Hay and Silage are also grown.The hay is baled in square bales or round bales. Haytime in the area is around early July ,silage is taken in mid-June and harvest is any time in August depending upon the weather.
